description: Signals that an item has been successfully removed from an entity's inventory and placed into an equipment slot. This event confirms the state change is complete. Note: Payloads use IDs for decoupling.

entityId.description: The unique ID of the entity whose equipment changed.

itemId.description: The unique identifier of the item instance that was equipped.

slotId.description: The identifier of the equipment slot the item was placed into.

itemInstanceId.description: The unique ID of the item instance that was equipped. (Same as itemId, potentially redundant but matches JSDoc).
